text:
@narendramodi 12-year-old walks 3 days amid #CoronavirusLockdown, dies just an hour from home https://t.co/njCnYQdyda https://t.co/scIeApW5U4

Dear PM, Your ill govt is responsible for this kid's death. #taketheresponsibility @SpiritOfCongres @srivatsayb @RahulGandhi
